short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates the CGPA and SGPA of the selected Semesters on AIMS Portal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GPA Genie - Your Academic Assistant for Effortless Grade Tracking

GPA Genie is the ultimate Chrome extension for students, designed to simplify grade tracking and GPA calculation. With just a few clicks, GPA Genie fetches your grades directly from IIIT Raichur AIMS website (requires login) and calculates your current GPA and CGPA automatically.

Key Features:

- Seamless Integration: Works directly on your institution’s grade portal for easy access.
- Real-Time GPA Calculation: Instantly calculate GPA and CGPA without manual entry.
- Secure and Private: Uses your logged-in session to fetch data securely—no extra credentials required.
- User-Friendly Interface: A clean, intuitive design that makes grade tracking stress-free.
- Time-Saving Automation: Forget manual calculations—focus on your studies while GPA Genie handles the math.

Take control of your academic journey with GPA Genie, your trusted partner for smarter, faster, and simpler grade management!

Developed by Shubham Dubey. Portfolio : shubhamdube.in
